channel.title: How do I make multiple pages cooperated?
channel.description:
Im using freehostia.com for the first time in my doomed life. Hoping anyone here will answer this question cuz im going nutzoe!
I'd also apreciate it if someone told me how to use the ftp panel thing well. Its annoying >.>....
Im pretty tired too so I can't even focus.... lol i hardly get time on computer daily but on weekends I do hehe ;D, only cuz of school >.>...

item.title: How do I make multiple pages cooperated?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Your better off using an ftp client. And I don’t understand your other question.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make multiple pages cooperated?
